Flow.description:
[26-Jun-2024] - Edit condition for getting metadata (Element: getMetaUsers). - Edit condition for getting FA from metadata (Element: getMetaUsers_FA). - Edit condition for getting MDC from metadata (Element: getMetaUsers_MDC). - Edit condition for getting TRCR from metadata (Element: getMetaUsersTRCR). - Edit condition for getting TRCR S/H from metadata (Element: getMetaUsersTRCRSH).
[03-Jul-2024] - Edit send email to FA body. - Edit send email to FA subject.

formulas.name: notifyBody_CreateShiptoInformMDC
formulas.expression: "Ship-to Information has been approved by Trader Section Head. Please review and submit for approval create ship-to master to SAP."

formulas.name: notifyBodyApproval_Block
formulas.expression: "Customer has been approved by Commitee. Please submit summary report."

formulas.name: notifyBodyApproval_CustomerChangeCreditCondition_TOPLABIX
formulas.expression: "Customer Credit Condition has been "+ Text({!$Record.Status__c})+" "+ "by Committee. Please submit summary report."

formulas.name: notifyBodyApproval_CustomerChangeCreditCondition_TX
formulas.expression: "Customer Credit Condition has been "+ Text({!$Record.Status__c} )+" "+"by Committee. Please submit summary report."

formulas.name: notifyBodyApproval_SupplierChangeCreditCondition_TOPLABIX
formulas.expression: "Supplier Credit Condition has been "+ Text({!$Record.Status__c} )+" "+ "by Committee. Please submit summary report."

formulas.name: notifyBodyApproval_SupplierChangeCreditCondition_TX
formulas.expression: "Supplier Credit Condition has been "+ Text({!$Record.Status__c} )+" "+ "by Committee. Please submit summary report."

formulas.name: notifyBodyRejected_Block
formulas.expression: "Customer has been rejected by Commitee. Please submit summary report."

formulas.name: notifyFinanceSHBody
formulas.expression: {!$Record.fmlAccountTypeName__c} + " has been " + TEXT({!$Record.Approval_Step__c}) + " by Committee. Please submit summary report."

formulas.name: notifyTitle_CreateShiptoInformMDC
formulas.expression: {!$Record.ShiptoName__c} & " is ready to review SAP Information"

Flow.label: CTRTriggerReqItemCommitteeApproval

start.filterLogic: (1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11)

textTemplates.name: emailFinanceBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.CommitteeOwner__r.FirstName} {!$Record.CommitteeOwner__r.LastName},

{!$Record.CompanyNameSubject__c} is {!$Record.Approval_Step__c} by Committee.
Please see the details via this link.

Best Regards,
Conterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: emailFinanceSHBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!getFinanceSHUser.FirstName} {!getFinanceSHUser.LastName},

{!$Record.CompanyNameSubject__c} is {!$Record.Approval_Step__c} by Committee. Please proceed via this link.

Best Regards,
Counterparties Registration Automated System
This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.

textTemplates.name: emailVPBody
textTemplates.text:
<span style="font-family: sans-serif;">Dear {!$Record.OwnersCMVP__r.FirstName} {!$Record.OwnersCMVP__r.LastName},</span><br>

<span style="font-family: sans-serif;">{!$Record.CompanyName__c} is {!$Record.Approval_Step__c} by Committee.</span>

<span style="font-family: sans-serif;">You can view the information via </span><a href="{!fmlRecLink}" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank" style="font-family: sans-serif;">this link</a><span style="font-family: sans-serif;">.</span><br>

<span style="font-family: sans-serif;">Best Regards,</span>

<span style="font-family: sans-serif;">Conterparties Registration Automated System</span>

<span style="font-family: sans-serif;">This is an automatic generated email. Please do not reply to this address.</span>
